metadata.title: CVE-2021-22192 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 13.2 allowing unauthorized authenticated users to executearbitrary code on the server.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
